title: Font from Gilda movie tittle
content:
Hello guys,

I quite like the "font" most likely a hand drawn illustration of the movie tittle from GILDA.  
Any suggestions as to what current font might come close?

thank you,  
Rodrigo

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011224542im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gilda-title-still_4010.jpeg)
author: MATOI Design Lab

comments.content: [Spire](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011224542/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Spire) is in the same vein. With a bit of customization, you could get pretty close.
